text: Billy Halop (February 11, 1920 - November 9, 1976) was an American actor. He was born in Jamaica, Queens. He was in many movies like, Dead End where he played a gang leader. He played the cab driver, "Mr. Munson" on the television situation comedy, All in the Family. He died on November 9, 1976. Category:1920 births Category:1976 deaths Category:Actors from Queens
title: Billy Halop
